Qt_Pwd::Qt_Pwd ( char *  password,
QWidget *  parent = 0,
const char *  name = 0,
bool  modal = FALSE,
WFlags  fl = WDestructiveClose 
)

Passes the password from the password dialog to the cmExperiment class.

Parameters:
password Pointer to the password
parent Pointer to the parent widget.
name Pointer to the internal name
modal Flag telling if the widget is going to be modal or not.
fl The widget flags argument, f, is normally 0, but it can be set to customize the window frame of a top-level widget (i.e. parent must be 0). To customize the frame, set the WStyle_Customize flag OR'ed with any of the Qt::WidgetFlags.
